div.p: … without delay, you having the right of execution against me and against all my belongings. The deed is binding, written in a single copy, and in reply to the formal question I assented. I, …, son of Hierax, deacon, have and owe … the aforesaid … gold solidi, which I shall repay whenever you wish as aforesaid. I …, son of ...chos, wrote on his behalf as he does not know letters … Translation: N. Gonis, P.Harr. 3 320
